title: API for Enhancing Social Engagement for Elderly Users
summary: As a developer, I want to access an API that allows me to integrate social engagement features into my applications so that elderly users can easily connect with their peers and caregivers, promoting social inclusion.

title: User Interest Insights for Application Development
summary: As a developer, I want access to user interest insights so that I can create tailored applications that engage elderly users and their caregivers effectively.

title: Integration for Scheduling Social Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate scheduling features for social activities into the ALFRED platform so that elderly users can easily find and participate in events that match their interests, thereby improving their social engagement.

title: Open API for Health Device Integration
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want access to robust APIs that facilitate the integration of various health monitoring devices, so that I can create applications that improve elderly users' health tracking and care management.

title: Cross-Platform Compatibility for Elderly Social Engagement Apps
summary: As a developer, I want to ensure that applications I build for ALFRED are compatible across various devices so that elderly users can easily access social engagement tools regardless of the technology they use.

title: Integration of Messaging Services for Enhanced Communication
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate messaging services into the ALFRED system so that elderly users can easily communicate with their caregivers and family members, enhancing social connectivity and support.

title: API Integration for Health Devices
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to create open APIs that facilitate the integration of various health-monitoring devices so that I can build applications that provide real-time health updates for elderly users and their caregivers.
